021import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
022import net.tnemc.core.config.MainConfig;
023import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
024import net.tnemc.core.manager.top.TopCurrency;
025import net.tnemc.core.manager.top.TopPage;
026import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
027import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageData;
028
029import java.util.ArrayList;
030import java.util.List;
031import java.util.Map;
032import java.util.UUID;
033import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
034import java.util.regex.Pattern;
035import java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException;
036
037/**
038 * TopManager handles all things baltop.
039 *
040 * @author creatorfromhell
041 * @since 0.1.2.0
042 */
043public class TopManager {
044
045  private final List<Pattern> regexExclusions = new ArrayList<>();
046  private final List<String> exclusions = new ArrayList<>();
047
048  private static TopManager instance;
049
050  private final Map<UUID, TopCurrency> topMap = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
051
052  public TopManager() {
053
054    instance = this;
055
056    for(final String str : MainConfig.yaml().getStringList("Core.Commands.Top.Exclusions")) {
057      try {
058        regexExclusions.add(Pattern.compile(str));
059      } catch(final PatternSyntaxException ignore) {
060        exclusions.add(str);
061      }
062    }
063  }
064
065  public void load() {
066
067    topMap.clear();
068    for(final Currency currency : TNECore.eco().currency().currencies()) {
069      topMap.put(currency.getUid(), new TopCurrency(PluginCore.server().defaultWorld(), currency.getUid()));
070    }
071  }
072
073  public Map<UUID, TopCurrency> getTopMap() {
074
075    return topMap;
076  }
077
078  public int position(final UUID currency, final String account) {
079
080    if(topMap.containsKey(currency)) {
081      return topMap.get(currency).getBalances().position(account);
082    }
083    return 0;
084  }
085
086  public String getAt(final int position, final UUID currency) {
087
088    if(topMap.containsKey(currency)) {
089      final int internalPos = (position % 5 == 0)? 5 : position % 5;
090
091
092      return topMap.get(currency).getBalances().getValues(positionToPage(position)).getAt(internalPos);
093    }
094    return "";
095  }
096
097  public MessageData getFor(final int position, final UUID currency) {
098
099    if(topMap.containsKey(currency)) {
100      final int internalPos = (position % 5 == 0)? 5 : position % 5;
101
102
103      return topMap.get(currency).getBalances().getValues(positionToPage(position)).getFor(internalPos, currency);
104    }
105    final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Money.PlaceholderTopEntry");
106    data.addReplacement("$toppos", String.valueOf(position));
107    data.addReplacement("$account", "no one");
108    data.addReplacement("$balance", "0");
109    return data;
110  }
111
112  public int positionToPage(final int position) {
113
114    int page = position / 5;
115
116    if(position % 5 != 0) page++;
117
118    return page;
119  }
120
121  public TopPage<String> page(final int page, final UUID currency) {
122
123    if(topMap.containsKey(currency)) {
124      return topMap.get(currency).getBalances().getValues(page);
125    }
126    return null;
127  }
128
129  public int page(final UUID currency) {
130
131    if(topMap.containsKey(currency)) {
132      return topMap.get(currency).getBalances().pages();
133    }
134    return 0;
135  }
136
137  public static TopManager instance() {
138
139    return instance;
140  }
141
142  public List<Pattern> getRegexExclusions() {
143
144    return regexExclusions;
145  }
146
147  public List<String> getExclusions() {
148
149    return exclusions;
150  }
151}
